content: Hotel Zen Tokyo's guest experience is crafted with the spirit of Japanese zen minimalism in mind. We have designed the most modern, compact rendition of traditional Japanese architecture in hopes to provide our guests with an opportunity to experience Japan to the fullest, with comfort, and at reasonable prices. Travellers enjoy a fusion of efficient capsule accommodations with authentic traditional design - in essence, a modern and urban ryokan experience in the heart of Tokyo. This is a test.
